DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study track post-discharge outcome prematurely born infant discharge NICU patent ductus arteriosus ( PDA ) . Investigators plan report spontaneous closure rate well incidence pulmonary and/or cardiac event infant . The goal identify risk factor associate adverse outcome prematurely born infant send home PDA .
DOC.criteria: Documentation inform consent authorization participation . Estimated gestational age 32 week less . Active diagnosis PDA discharge . At least one echocardiogram obtain hospital stay documenting/ confirm PDA diagnosis . Parental agreement provide followup information child . Cardiologist and/or Pediatrician willing provide followup information enrol infant . No known major congenital anomaly ( inborn error metabolism , cyanotic congenital heart disease , gastroschisis , omphalocele , diaphragmatic hernia major gastrointestinal anomaly , major neurological injury anomaly , multiple congenital anomaly ) . Chromosomal / genetic disorder Inherited metabolic disorder ( Aa , fat carbohydrate ) , Trisomies , Turner 's syndrome , Vater 's syndrome , CHARGE , DiGeorge 22q11 deletion , Major chromosomal duplication , deletion detectable high resolution karyotype ( microarray ) . Parent ( ) unwilling participate followup .
